mapper.insert: insert into f_review(no, content, reg_date, writer, fid) values(f_review_seq.nextVal, #{content}, sysdate, #{writer}, #{fid})
mapper.select: select no, content, reg_date, writer, fid from f_review where fid = #{fid} order by no desc
mapper.update: update f_review set content=#{content},reg_date=sysdate where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from f_review where fid =#{fid}
